metadata.name: In the middle of the mindless war
metadata.description:
Thousands of death, broken families, wounded bodies, and souls, that all seems surreal before it happens in front of you.. 
That is what I hear every day and every night.. we will never be the same that before..

Hand-Drawn Frame by Frame Animation (loop)
Title: In the middle of the mindless war
Series: Flaming snowman head 
Resolution: 3024× 2160
Format: MP4 
Year: 2022, March 24th
